title: Contacts (com.apple.carddav.account)
description: The payload that configures a Contacts account.

CardDAVPrincipalURL.title: Principal URL
CardDAVPrincipalURL.description: The base URL to the user's address book.

CardDAVPassword.title: Account Password
CardDAVPassword.description: The user's password. Only use this in encrypted profiles.

CommunicationServiceRules.title: Communication Service Rules
CommunicationServiceRules.description: An array of communication service rules for this account.

DefaultServiceHandlers.title: Default Service Handlers
DefaultServiceHandlers.description: A dictionary of service handlers for contacts from this account.

AudioCall.title: App for audio calls
AudioCall.description: The bundle identifier for the default application that handles audio calls to contacts from this account.

VPNUUID.title: VPNUUID
VPNUUID.description: The VPNUUID of the per-app VPN the account uses for network communication. Available in iOS 14 and later.
